column4: I have an ATI Mobility Radeon X600. A bit confused as to which driver gives the best performance. I'm currently getting ~1600FPS in glxgears... Beryl runs ok but Google Earth is slow as hell. Should I install the driver in aptitude or the one in restricted drivers? or keep this one?
I just want to know if I should use aptitude or restricted or if it is not worth the risk?
I believe that what you're talking about are two different interfaces to the same thing.
